#summary Scratch page for October 2011 training course

http://sadiframework.org/examples/t/bmi-input.rdf

= Java code =
{{{
Resource height = input.getRequiredProperty(Vocab.has_height).getResource();
double height_value = height.getRequiredProperty(Vocab.has_value).getDouble();
Property has_units = ResourceFactory.createProperty("http://mged.sourceforge.net/ontologies/MGEDOntology.owl#has_units");
Resource height_units = height.getRequiredProperty(has_units).getResource();
Resource mass = input.getRequiredProperty(Vocab.has_mass).getResource();
double mass_value = mass.getRequiredProperty(Vocab.has_value).getDouble();
Resource mass_units = mass.getRequiredProperty(has_units).getResource();

double bmi = mass_value / (height_value * height_value);
output.addLiteral(Vocab.BMI, bmi);
}}}

= Generate test output =
{{{
$ curl --data @'/home/user/workspace/sadi-services/src/main/resources/bmi-input.rdf'  http://localhost:8080/sadi-services/Calculate+BMI
